com.darwinsys.swingui.layout
Class CircleLayout

java.lang.Object
  com.darwinsys.swingui.layout.CircleLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.LayoutManager
public class CircleLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager

A simplistic CircleLayout implementation of the LayoutManager interface. Components are drawn at their preferred size.
Bugs:

  • Only works well if the container is approximately square.

Version:
$Id: CircleLayout.java,v 1.9 2004/06/01 02:51:37 ian Exp $
Author:
Ian F. Darwin, http://www.darwinsys.com/
